form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Screeneded by NARA, 7/7/2023, United States Department of State

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/7/2023 United States Department of State Washington, D.C. 20520 May 25, 1988 NAME: RAMIREZ-GUADAMUZ, Josefa Feliciana A # : 28 961 620 COUNTRY of BIRTH or NATIONAL of NICARAGUA Mr. David N. Ilchert, District Director Immigration and Naturalization Service 630 Sansome Street San Francisco, California 94111 Dear Mr. Ilchert: This is in response to your letter asking for an advisory opinion on the above applicant's request for asylum in the United States. Upon careful review of the information submitted and assuming the facts of this case as stated in the application are true, it is our view that the applicant has a well-founded fear of persecution in Nicaragua within the meaning of the Immigration and Nationality Act, as amended. I trust that this advisory opinion will be helpful in reaching a decision in this case. Sincerely, Edward H. Wilkinson, Director Office of Asylum Affairs Bureau of Human Rights and Humanitarian Affairs
